name: shapeless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without a clear form or structure: My clay pot ended up as just a shapeless lump. His ideas are interesting, but they're rather shapeless.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an object) not having an appearance that you consider clear, pleasing, or correct: Summer and winter she wore the same array of faded gingham dresses and shapeless sweaters.
